bad_parameters.message: The parameters received are not recognized by this api, please check the usage again.

save_error.message: There was an error saving the data sent, please try again later.

database_error.message: There was an error with the database, please try again later.

no_records.message: There are no records that apply to this request

date_mismatch.message: The end date provided precedes the start date. Switch and try again.

future_date.message: The date(s) provided are sometime in the future. Those records have yet to be collected and calculated.

invalid_timezone.message: The timezone supplied is not a recognized time zone id
